backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, access control, and CRUD operations for Facebook outreach entries with attachments and timestamps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking implemented UI features to source files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables, theming, and base typography for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app via the root div and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing navigation between Dashboard and Hook Library within theme and query providers.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DaysSi: Dashboard card computing days since last post per group and displaying results in a sortable table with warning colors.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Follow: Dashboard list showing entries requiring follow‑up today with status badges, links, and quick edit actions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Succes: Displays a bar-style chart of groups sorted by success count, or a placeholder message if no data is provided.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Winnin: Shows posts with more than five comments, sorted by engagement, or a fallback message when none exist.
frontend/src/components/entries/DeleteEn: Confirmation dialog for deleting an outreach entry, calling a delete mutation and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesT: Renders a table of outreach entries with status badges, actions, and delete/edit options.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntryFor: Form dialog for creating or editing an entry, handling validation, image uploads, and loading group notes.
frontend/src/components/entries/entryFor: Provides URL and non‑negative number validators returning structured validation results.
frontend/src/components/entries/ImageUpl: UI component for selecting, previewing, replacing, or removing an image file in entry forms.
frontend/src/components/entries/response: Defines response status options and functions to map statuses to labels and CSS style classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: UI layout component providing header, navigation, main content, and footer structure for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTokenActor.ts: Creates an anonymous actor initialized with an admin token when present.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousActor.ts: Provides a simple anonymous backend actor for unauthenticated access.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthorizedActor.ts: Determines the current auth mode and selects the correct actor, exposing readiness and context keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useHookTemplateLibrar: Fetches and saves hook templates using the authorized actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication lifecycle, storing identity and providing login utilities.
Defines mutations for creating, updating, deleting outreach entries and saving group notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useOutreachQueries.ts: Provides queries for outreach entries, follow‑ups, group summaries, and notes using the authorized actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme CSS variables for light/dark modes with OKLCH colors and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with entries, charts, reminders, and entry form dialog, handling loading and auth states.
frontend/src/pages/HookTemplateLibraryPa: Displays and edits three hook templates with save, copy, and loading/error handling using backend hooks.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormat.ts: Provides helper functions to format dates for display, inputs, and backend storage.
frontend/src/utils/imageFile.ts: Validates image files, converts files to Uint8Array, and creates preview URLs for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme with OKLCH color variables, custom fonts, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current version, feature set, architectural notes, and known auth-related issues for a marketing tracker web app. Highlights dashboard requirements, response status constraints, and recurring identity/session mismatches between frontend and backend.
